trans-unit.source: Contains information about a deployment step for SharePoint projects.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关 SharePoint 项目部署步骤的信息。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio passes an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo> object to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Initialize%2A> method of <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep> implementations.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将传递<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo>对象传递给<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Initialize%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep>实现。

trans-unit.source: Set properties of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo> object to specify the name, description, and other details for the deployment step.
trans-unit.target: 设置属性的<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo>对象来指定名称、 说明和部署步骤的其他详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the deployment step.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部署步骤的说明。

trans-unit.source: The description of the deployment step.
The description should be a localized resource.
trans-unit.target: 描述应该是已本地化的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the deployment step.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部署步骤的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the deployment step.
The ID should be a localized resource.
trans-unit.target: ID 应为本地化的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo" /> 对象是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo" /> object is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo" /> 对象为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo> objects can be modified only inside the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Initialize%2A> method of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStepInfo> 可以修改对象，仅在内<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Initialize%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep>实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the deployment step.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部署步骤的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the deployment step.
Gets or sets the message that is shown in the status bar when the deployment step is executing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置执行部署步骤时，状态栏中显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message that is shown in the status bar when the deployment step is executing.
trans-unit.target: 当执行部署步骤在状态栏中显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message should be a localized resource.
trans-unit.target: 消息应的本地化的资源。
